name: VOIDRUN (itch) (Nathan Wiles)
description:
VOIDRUN is my submission to the Brackeys 2020.1 Game Jam.

Sink the balls into the glowing goals to score points. Adjust your shots for the gravity of the black hole, and make sure you don't fall into it!

Controls:

Mouse Move: Steer ship.
Left Click: Fire ball.
W/S : Strafe up/down.
A/D: Strafe left/right.
Q/E: Roll your ship.

Attribution:
